reqs:
Large Instrumental Ensemble - LRGE INST ENSEMB
UBC Concert Winds - Open only to graduate students (see MUSC 150c for undergraduate registration)
UBC Concert Winds
Open to both music and non-music majors performing on woodwinds, brass, or percussion. Entrance is by audition, taking place each September. While every effort is made to place students in appropriate ensembles based upon audition results, those taking this course as an elective are advised to have an alternate course ready in the unlikely case where an ensemble placement is not available.
The ensemble rehearses four hours per week, on Monday and Wednesday evenings, and makes four performances each year. The majority of rehearsals and concerts take place in Chan Centre. Additional information regarding auditions, including downloadable excerpts for each instrument, can be found at www.music.ubc.ca/student-ensembles.html
courseName: Large Instrumental Ensemble - LARGE INST ENSEM
description: Symphony Orchestra or Wind Ensemble. Open only to graduate students.
